summary: This is a congratulatory email sent on December 29, 2021, regarding the guilty verdict in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The sender commends the recipients for their hard work and persistence in achieving justice.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Verdict
events.description: The guilty verdict in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial was announced. The email sender congratulates the recipients on this outcome.

keyFacts: The document is a congratulatory email sent on December 29, 2021.
The email references the guilty verdict in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
The sender commends the recipients' hard work and persistence in achieving justice.
The email implies the recipients were involved in the legal efforts leading to the verdict.
